comment.author: 69679868@N03
comment._content:
Reginald Henry Napier Settle was one of 3 Gentlemen Cadets Commissioned into the 19th Hussars from the Royal Military College on 3rd September 1910.

He was Gazetted with the award of the Military Cross as a Captain on 2nd June 1916.

He was awarded his DSO as a Captain (Temporary Major) in the New Year Honours of 1 January 1918.

21st Battalion Machine Gun Corps was formed on 24th February 1918 from the Machine Gun Companies of 21st Division.//
